page.title: The $itemName
page.text: The $itemName, is the block equivalent to the [item name=matter_scanner]. The main difference is, the $itemName is the only way to scan items. It also scans items and blocks twice as much as the [item name=matter_scanner], increasing their progress by 20%.

page.title: How to use
page.text: The $itemName requires power, in order to function. When an item is placed in the input slot, the analyzer will search for valid destinations. It will need to find a valid [item name=pattern_drive] to use as storage. The drives will be housed in [item name=pattern_storage]. The $itemName must be connected to a Matter Network to search for free pattern storage. It can only be connected trough it's back side.

The Analyzer is smart enough to hold progression when pattern storage is not found. A [item name=network_flash_drive] can be used to limit the pattern storage blocks the Analyzer can interact with, by putting it in the network filter slot in the configurations tab.
